#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int x,y,z,p=1,k,a;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
        k=x-y+1;
        a=1000000007;
        for(z=k;z<=x;z++){
            p=(p*z)%a;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",p);
    }
    return 0;
}
